mapper.select: select count(boNum) from CLASSBOARD where boCode =#{boCode} and boURL=#{boURL}
select * from CLASSBOARD b, member a where b.memNum=a.memNum and boNum=#{boNum} and boCode =#{boCode} and boURL=#{boURL}
mapper.insert:
select seq_board.nextval from dual
insert into classboard(boNum,boTitle,boContent,boCode,boRegdate,boUpdatedate,boURL,memNum,boViews,boLikes) values(#{boNum},#{boTitle},#{boContent},#{boCode},TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),#{boURL},#{memNum},to_number(#{boViews}),to_number(#{boLikes}))
mapper.delete: delete from classboard where boNum=#{boNum} and boCode=#{boCode} and boURL=#{boURL}
mapper.update: update classboard set boTitle=#{boTitle}, boContent=#{boContent}, memNum=#{memNum}, boUpdateDate=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') where boNum=#{boNum} and boCode=#{boCode} and boURL=#{boURL}
